Posts.EditableText: When using Opera 12 and looking at the list of games the cover art images for the games don't seem to load. This may be caused by using of https at the front of the image link rather than http
Posts.HTML: When using Opera 12 and looking at the list of games the cover art images for the games don't seem to load. This may be caused by using of https at the front of the image link rather than http
